Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Hotel Playafels places you in the heart of Castelldefels, convenient to Castelldefels Castle and Anec Blau Shopping Center. This 4-star hotel is within the vicinity of Olympic Canal and Bodegas Guell.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 68 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and bicycles to rent. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Playafels. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and a computer station. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Playafels. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Castelldefels Castle - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Anec Blau Shopping Center - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Olympic Canal - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Bodegas Guell - 5.4 km / 3.4 mi
Sakya Tashi Ling - 10.1 km / 6.3 mi
Church of Colonia Guell - 11.9 km / 7.4 mi
Aiguadolc Port - 12.4 km / 7.7 mi
Sitges Beach - 13.4 km / 8.3 mi
Cau Ferrat Museum - 13.5 km / 8.4 mi
Maricel Museum - 13.6 km / 8.4 mi
Church of Sant Bartomeu and Santa Tecla - 13.7 km / 8.5 mi
Romantic Museum - 13.9 km / 8.6 mi
Saint Ponc Monastery - 15.9 km / 9.9 mi
Terramar Golf Club - 16.3 km / 10.1 mi
Fira Barcelona - 16.5 km / 10.2 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Playafels is Barcelona (BCN-Barcelona Intl.) - 9.9 km / 6.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

RoomType.text: Double or Twin EXECUTIVE SEA VIEW
